page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE - 28TH JUNE
page.content: I got up at a quarter to nine Friday morning on the 28th of June. I had toast and Frosties for breakfast at nine and then got dressed. At quarter past nine I washed my hair and then played on the Sinclair ZX Spectrum computer. At ten o'clock our horse riding lesson started so we left here at quarter to ten. We went out for a hack and got back at eleven. When we got back I had a salad for dinner. After dinner I sat down and watched television. After that I had a game of tennis with my sister. By that time it was late afternoon so I got on my bike and went down to Old Buckenham and met one of my friends and then came home for tea. I had roast beef, Yorkshire pudding, cauliflower, gravy, potatoes. After tea I watched television awhile and then at nine o'clock I got ready for bed.
